HomePage.title: EduPrompt - AI-Powered Education Platform
HomePage.description: Transform your teaching with AI-powered prompts and educational tools

Hero.continueJourney: Continue your journey with AI-powered teaching tools. Access your saved prompts, create new ones, and discover fresh ideas for your classroom.
Hero.streamline: Streamline your lesson planning with our intelligent prompt management system. Create, share, and personalize AI prompts tailored to your teaching style and curriculum.

Features.title: Everything You Need to Enhance Teaching
Features.subtitle: Discover powerful features designed specifically for high school educators
Features.repositoryDesc: Access thousands of categorized prompts organized by subject, grade level, and teaching objectives.
Features.personalizationDesc: AI adapts prompts to match your unique teaching style, subject expertise, and classroom needs.
Features.collaborationDesc: Share, rate, and collaborate on prompts with fellow educators in your school and beyond.
Features.suggestionsDesc: Get intelligent recommendations based on your teaching patterns and curriculum requirements.
Features.accessDesc: Secure permissions system for teachers, administrators, and system managers.
Features.crossPlatformDesc: Access your prompts anywhere with our responsive web platform and mobile app.

Pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
Pricing.subtitle: Flexible pricing options for individual teachers and schools

CTA.title: Ready to Transform Your Teaching?
CTA.subtitle: Join thousands of educators already using EduPrompt to create more engaging and effective lessons.

Manage.confirmRollback: Are you sure you want to rollback to this version? Current changes will be saved as a new version.

Group.title: Group Management
Group.subtitle: Manage your study groups and classes.
Group.noGroupsDesc: Create a group to start collaborating with students or peers.
Group.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this group? This action cannot be undone.
Group.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member?

GroupModal.createDesc: Create a new group to manage members.
GroupModal.name: Name

Subscription.aiOptimizationsDesc: Refine and improve your prompts using AI.
Subscription.testingRunDesc: Run test cases to verify prompt accuracy.
Subscription.promptViewsDesc: View or unlock detailed prompts from the community.
Subscription.schoolSubscriptionGrant: Your school subscription grants you unlimited access to:
Subscription.manageBilling: Manage your billing and plan details

upgrade.title: Upgrade Your Plan
upgrade.customSchoolLimits: Custom limits tailored for school-wide usage with centralized billing and admin controls.

Auth.signInSubtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
Auth.joinSubtitle: Join thousands of educators using EduPrompt

Auth.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.

Create.title: Create New Prompt
Create.promptDescriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of what this prompt does
Create.instructionMinLength: Instruction must be at least 20 characters long.
Create.collectionNameRequired: Please enter a name for your new collection.
Create.fileSizeLimit: File size must be less than 10MB
Create.pleaseSaveBeforeTest: Please save the prompt before running a test.
Create.pleaseSaveBeforeOptimize: Please save the prompt before requesting optimization.

essay.title: Essay Writing Assistant
essay.instruction: Help students write well-structured academic essays with clear thesis statements, supporting arguments, and proper conclusions.
essay.context: Academic writing context with focus on critical thinking and argumentation.
essay.inputExample: Topic: Climate change effects on agriculture
essay.outputFormat: Structured essay with introduction, body paragraphs, and conclusion
essay.constraints: Minimum 500 words, academic tone, cite sources when applicable

math.title: Math Problem Solver
math.instruction: Provide step-by-step solutions to mathematical problems, explaining each step clearly.
math.context: Educational mathematics with focus on understanding concepts.
math.constraints: Show all work, explain reasoning for each step

code.title: Code Review Assistant
code.instruction: Review code for best practices, bugs, and improvements. Provide constructive feedback.
code.context: Programming education and code quality improvement.
code.inputExample: function calculateSum(a, b) { return a + b; }
code.outputFormat: Detailed review with suggestions and improved code
code.constraints: Focus on readability, efficiency, and best practices

language.title: Language Practice Conversation
language.instruction: Engage in natural conversation to help students practice language skills.
language.context: Language learning environment with supportive feedback.

creative.title: Creative Writing Assistant
creative.instruction: Help students develop creative writing skills through engaging prompts and feedback.
creative.context: Creative writing education with focus on imagination and storytelling.
creative.inputExample: Write a short story about a time traveler

science.title: Science Explanation Assistant
science.instruction: Explain scientific concepts in clear, accessible language for students.
science.context: Science education with focus on understanding complex concepts.
science.outputFormat: Clear explanation with examples and analogies
science.constraints: Use appropriate terminology, include visual descriptions

history.title: History Analysis Assistant
history.instruction: Help students analyze historical events and their significance.
history.context: History education with focus on critical analysis and context.',
history.inputExample: Analyze the causes of World War I
history.constraints: Cite historical evidence, consider different viewpoints

business.title: Business Case Study Assistant
business.instruction: Guide students through business problem analysis and solution development.
business.context: Business education with focus on practical problem-solving.
business.constraints: Use business frameworks, provide actionable insights

OptimizationPanel.title: AI Optimization
OptimizationPanel.description: Enhance your prompt using AI. Select a model and provide specific instructions on how you want to improve it.
OptimizationPanel.instructionsPlaceholder: e.g., Make it more concise, add more examples, fix grammar...

Footer.tagline: Empowering educators with AI-driven teaching tools.
